Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to gift certificates and gift cards; repealer
Summary: Prohibits expiration dates and dormancy service fees in certain instances; requires retailers to redeem card balances of $10 or less for cash at consumer's request.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง396-i, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to gift certificates and gift cards; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
